introduction:
The Engineering Chemistry Virtual Lab provides students with practical exposure to essential chemical concepts used in engineering applications. This lab includes experiments related to water analysis, solution chemistry, surface chemistry, adsorption, and reaction kinetics.
Through an interactive virtual environment, students can perform standard laboratory experiments such as titrations, hardness determination, surface tension measurement, and kinetic studies. These experiments help in understanding real-world chemical processes in a safe and accessible manner.

objective: The Engineering Chemistry Lab helps students learn basic chemical concepts and their use in engineering. It covers important topics such as electrochemistry, kinetics, and material science through interactive simulations. Students can perform experiments, analyze data, and understand results in a safe, virtual environment without needing a physical lab. This lab improves analytical skills and highlights the importance of chemistry in engineering fields.
